alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Chase; Grant; Hayes; Hooker; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Perkins; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 2:51AM CST until December 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT TO 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Portions of north central, southwest and west central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ this evening. For the Blizzard Warning, from midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight to 6 AM CST /5 AM MST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact travel. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.

area.areaDesc: Arthur; Chase; Grant; Hayes; Hooker; Keith; Lincoln; Logan; McPherson; Perkins; Thomas
